text: As he turned aside his head, since he could not bear to look at her beautiful, pleading face, he was suddenly attacked by suspicion. 'You wish to marry someone else?' he cried in a voice roughened by jealousy. She sighed deeply, and looked away. 'Do you? Do you?' he repeated, fiercely.
handwritten_text: As he turned aside his head, since he could not bear to look at her beautiful, pleading face, he was suddenly attacked by suspicion. 'You wish to marry someone else?' he cried in a voice roughened by jealousy. She sighed deeply, and looked away. 'Do you? Do you?' he repeated, fiercely.
